class.name: InstanceOfQueryExp
class.javadoc:
This class is used by the query building mechanism for isInstanceOf expressions.
include
1.6
@serial The {@link StringValueExp} returning the name of the class of which selected MBeans should be instances.

Creates a new InstanceOfExp with a specific class name.
classNameValue The {@link StringValueExp} returning the name of the class of which selected MBeans should be instances.

method.name: InstanceOfQueryExp
method.comment: We are using StringValueExp here to be consistent with other queries, although we should actually either use a simple string (the classname) or a ValueExp - which would allow more complex queries - like for instance evaluating the class name from an AttributeValueExp. As it stands - using StringValueExp instead of a simple constant string doesn't serve any useful purpose besides offering a consistent look & feel.

class.javadoc:
Returns the class name.
The {@link StringValueExp} returning the name of the class of which selected MBeans should be instances.

Applies the InstanceOf on a MBean.
name The name of the MBean on which the InstanceOf will be applied.
True if the MBean specified by the name is instance of the class.
BadAttributeValueExpException
InvalidApplicationException
BadStringOperationException
BadBinaryOpValueExpException

method.name: apply
method.comment: Should not happen - unless someone wrongly implemented StringValueExp.apply().
Test whether the MBean is an instance of that class.

class.javadoc:
Returns a string representation of this InstanceOfQueryExp.
a string representation of this InstanceOfQueryExp.
